snippet.title: Aura of Worlds | New Launch Trailer | AVAILABLE NOW on Steam and Nintendo Switch!
snippet.description:
Aura of Worlds is a chaotic, creative tactics rogue-lite platformer. Explore multiple dangerous worlds where you utilize creative abilities & wield the environment to your advantage. Blast, dash, grapple, fight, and charm your way through ever-changing death labyrinths & outwitting powerful guardians!

The full game has fully released on September 24th on PC and Nintendo Switch. Graduating to 1.0 on Steam.

Steam (Windows/Steam Deck/Mac/Linux):
* https://store.steampowered.com/app/841600/Aura_of_Worlds

Nintendo eShop:
* U.S. Store: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/aura-of-worlds-switch
* U.K. Store: https://www.nintendo.com/en-gb/Games/Nintendo-Switch-download-software/Aura-of-Worlds-2635198.html
